Description:
Small penguin from N64 Sherbet Land. It creates a symmetrical copy of itself under the ground to simulate an ice reflection.
[[KMP (File Format)#POTI|Route Setting 1]]: 0 = Default; 1 = Glide; 2 = Animation faster; 3 = Default.
[[KMP (File Format)#POTI|Route Setting 2]] describes the speed when Route Setting 1 â‰  0, but always requires a value â‰  0.
Slot [[#6.1|6.1]] enables its SFX.
